news_header: Amazon.com Inc. is set to report its fourth-quarter 2024 earnings on February 6, 2025, with strong growth expected in revenues and earnings per share.
news_original_title: Buy Amazon Ahead of Earnings Today on Strong EPS Estimate Revisions
news_text: Amazon.com Inc. (AMZN) will release its fourth-quarter 2024 earnings results on February 6, 2025. The company has a Zacks Rank of #2 (Buy) and an Earnings ESP of +4.78%. Analysts predict a revenue of $187.28 billion, a 10.2% increase year-over-year, and an EPS of $1.52, up 50.5% year-over-year. Amazon's growth is driven by strong Prime services, AWS cloud dominance, and a robust advertising business. The company has shown positive earnings surprises in recent quarters and is expected to continue its upward trend in 2024 and 2025.
